content.raw: I have one suggestion, probably for a separate pull request. The way the output is presented is great for humans but a bit harder to consume for a script. We could offer an extra option for helping this use case. This option might remove the colors, arrows and maybe use some convention, such as scoped names or similar (e.g.: "https://staging-api.ignitionfuel.org::chapulina::Red box") where a program can easily parse server name, username and model name.
